channel.title: Spam code (for rs2 private servers)?

item.title: Spam code (for rs2 private servers)?
item.dc:creator: @iKillAssassins iKillAssassins
item.description:
@iKillAssassins wrote:

[quote=“Trigger*, post:25, topic:252659”][quote author=SkillersDream link=topic=333749.msg2599988#msg2599988 date=1230171455]

I have no proof that i worked on it,but i swear to SANTA that i tried to add the command but i had 100 errors,i tried to look on forum,there isn’t a spam code yet.

So true, so true.

On-topic : Are we or are we not getting progress on this? And btw, to those who feel as though they need to kill on the topic starter – we really don’t need to discourage him or yell random things. Just saying that he needs to show us what he’s tried and what’s actually wrong ONCE is good enough.

why swear on someone that dosn’t exist?
[/quote]
You just gotta believe.[/quote]

Read full topic

for (int x = 0; x < 10; x++){



			String text = command.substring(8);
				yell("" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));


}}

item.title: Spam code (for rs2 private servers)?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

nope. unless you might to do something like this:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("spam"))
{
int timesToRepeat = 301;
String SpamText = command.substring(5);

for(int index = 0; index < timesToRepeat; index++)
{
yell(SpamText);
}
}

item.title: Spam code (for rs2 private servers)?
item.dc:creator: @benesjake benesjake
item.description:
@benesjake wrote:

client.java:7061: array required, but java.lang.String found
int timesToRepeat = (Integer.parseInt(command[1]) + 1);
^
client.java:7061: operator + cannot be applied to ,int
int timesToRepeat = (Integer.parseInt(command[1]) + 1);
^
client.java:7061: incompatible types
found :
required: int
int timesToRepeat = (Integer.parseInt(command[1]) + 1);
^
client.java:7064: array required, but java.lang.String found
yell(command[2]);
^
4 errors
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

(I’m using deltascape source and i hope CMD is Command :p)
Please help?

Read full topic

item.title: Spam code (for rs2 private servers)?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Follow the rules. It says, That there is no spoonfeeding, we can’t help you if we don’t know what you’ve done. Show proof you’ve made an attempt, etc.

3. We are not a Spoonfeeding community. We do not teach in an oversimplified manner to discourage independent thought. We encourage independent thought, meaning you must help yourselves before requesting help. Failure to provide some sort of prior knowledge or work to the problem will result in a lock of the topic. This is final.

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:1, topic:202972”]This means be specific, State what you want clearly, and show the attempts you have made to finding your answer.

Edit by TeleNubby:
It seems as if you guys are not understanding the message and meaning behind this post. Therefore, I will elaborate for you.

Next, you’ll have to show us what you’ve already done. THIS IS A MUST! If we want to get anywhere as a community, we’re going to have to quit the spoon-feeding. So if you ask something like “how do I get food healing to work” and show us no previous attempts, you’re not going to get an answer. You may be wondering how a question like this is considered bad. Well, the question asker did not make an attempt to solve the problem him or herself, and is indirectly asking the same question as “tell me how to get food healing work so I can continue my effortless server.” So, remember, show us what you’ve done, what you’ve tried to do, or what you think may work.

Remember, this is just the bare minimum. Try and keep your questions as elaborate as possible. This will benefit yourself and the community as a whole, as you will be learning in the process and we will be able to help solve your problem faster.

Edit: Seeing as most of you think this is a joke, warnings will now be handed out if you disobey this.[/quote]

Read full topic
